status code? ( junit & ant problem)


Hello.  I'm learning junit, a=
nd I'm working through one of the tutorials
listed on junit.org titled "Inc=
remental development with Ant and JUnit".
The problem I'm having is that wh=
en I run ant, my junit reports an error,
but ant reports an overall success=
.  If I add a System.exit(1) to the end of
my main method in my Test progra=
m, ant reports a FAILURE.  I'm following the
tutorial as it's written, but =
I can't seem to make ant fail when junit does.
Would someone please look at=
 my build.xml (trimmed), junit code, and my
output and see if I'm making a =
mistake somewhere?

Thanks for your time,
Perry Tew

sion.novartis.com
